content: Simple solution — Get rid of GarPax! Those guys are straight buffoons! They can’t attract big name free agents, they have overvalued our players throughout the years & can seldom can pull off a significant trade. They’ve been on borrowed time the last 5 years but with Jerry ReinsDORK as the owner they stick around. Da Mules need some Cubbie magic but unfortunately there is no Theo Epstein to scoop up to turn this around. For shame…
